fields.description:
This is not a regression.It also occurs on 2.1.0. But it works fine on 2.0.2.

On 2.1.0 and 2.1.1 , it gives a warning message. Logs are attached.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install the refactored kitchen sink on android device and run it.
2) Go to Phone -> Sound -> Local with File and press 'Play' button.

Expected result:
2) After step 2, a sound file(cricket.wav) should get played.

Actual result:
2) No sound file is played .Instead a warning message is displayed in adb logs.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Sound:Local with File:Sound file not getting played.
